title: Support chat could be less cumbersome
text: I‚Äôm not sure why the support chats show up randomly in my personal account when I‚Äôm messaging as a host. Toggling back and forth is cumbersome and time consuming. The new interface is a little difficult to get used to in terms of finding things. I only stumbled on how to get to the place where I can edit my listing settings and even now I‚Äôm not sure how I got there. Editing the listing should be all in one place and not having to go to your calendar to edit certain parameters. overall, the app is OK.

title: Frustrated Super Host
text:
We‚Äôre Superhosts and have hosted on Airbnb for many years. Mostly, our experience has been positive‚Ä¶and much better than VRBO which was a terrible app. But there is something they need to fix before it comes up again for me.

First of all, however, I‚Äôm not a fan of the options available when setting up our cancellation policy for our guests. For a full refund, you can set it up for 24 hours out, 5 days, or 30 days. No differentiation between 1-night stays, which aren‚Äôt a big deal and week+ stays which are.

But my current frustration is that I recently had a one-night guest cancel 4 days in advance due to a family emergency. I told them if they cancel, I could refund their money. I‚Äôd done this for other guests in the past. But after they canceled, I found out this feature had been changed, and I could no longer do what I‚Äôd promised. I had to go through the support team, explaining the situation, having the representative misunderstand, explaining it again, and having them do what I should‚Äôve been able to do myself. And oh the joys of a representative telling you how to navigate the app when you already know how to use it well and know what they‚Äôre telling you won‚Äôt work.

Fix this please. If a guest cancels, and I wish to refund their money, I want the ability to take care of it myself.

title: Pool table filter
text: I love this app! I love traveling. I just wish I could put if I want a pool table in the filter please!

title: Can‚Äôt read inbox messages!!
text: The app is simple and quite useful overall, but have not been able to see beyond a blank page when I open messages in Inbox. What‚Äôs going wrong??

title: We love Airbnb
text:
I‚Äôm a 5 star host in Fayetteville, Arkansas. My co-host Amanda Hall is our managing host. We are on walking distance of all UofA Sports. 
Airbnb seems to be helping rentals that are making efforts to insure good rental services.

title: Quick refund!
text: I had to cancel the reservation and within seconds. My refund had been placed in my account. Also, I love the way they keep you updated.üëç

title: Grateful
text:
We are so thankful for the Airbnb staff and responsiveness after our reservation was canceled by the host.  

Airbnb staff helped us to reserve a bigger and more spacious beach home. They even applied a substantial discount. 

Thank you!
